website_summaries.verdict: This beam is best for toddlers and elementary-age children to practice simple routines. It may be too soft for older children to practice more advanced techniques.
pros: Widens toward base for extra stability
Lightweight enough for children to move
cons: Foam may not support children doing more advanced gymnastics

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Does not lay flat
customer_reviews.text: The mat folds in the middle which is great. However, when it's unfolded one side does not lay flat and doesn't line up straight with the other half. Check out the picture and you will see what I mean. As a result my granddaughter doesn't use it much and I regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Good for small kids to play on
customer_reviews.text: Good for small kids to play on. Not so great for my 6 year old who is trying to practice exercises from class. We had to buy a real balance beam. Recommend using with floor mats as the beam does tend to move and shift.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this beam! It is excellent quality and has helped improve her on the beam in her gymnastics class. It is very durable and has maintained it shape even with pretty regular use! I love that it folds up for storage!
customer_reviews.author: london8875

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our budding gymnist. We have a high beam but this is perfect for my daughter to practice her flips and tricks on safely.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Great starter
customer_reviews.text: Great starting practice beam. It's a dense foam and low profile perfect for practicing roles and cartwheels for starting gymnast.
customer_reviews.author: animal lover

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a balance beam for your child to practice on...this one isn't it. I do not recommend it. It's flimsy and worthless. My daughter is rock steady on the one at gymnastics. this one? She can't even stand on it for five seconds without falling off due to the padded mat giving way under her feet.
customer_reviews.author: LBell

customer_reviews.title: Which is very sturdy and holds her weight very well
customer_reviews.text: Do not consider this for a gymnast. My daughter is 10 years old, a petite 4'9 80lbs. and I intended to replace the worn out beam she's had. Which is very sturdy and holds her weight very well. This product should not be used as a beam for a serious gymnast. It does not hold her up, it caves in as she walks and she's unable to practice her routine. Would be fine as a toy or a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: theresa robitaille

customer_reviews.title: Great Balance Beam!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this balance beam for my daughter, who is on a team in gymnastics. At first they didn't have pink, which happens to be her favorite color. I waited for a long time for the company to restock, but it never happened. I finally called them and found out they had a shipment coming soon, which I waited for. I am so glad I did. This balance beam is nice and colorful, good quality, folds up nicely for storage and is easy enough for my 10 year out to take it out and put it away by herself.
customer_reviews.author: chel2305

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: My girls use this daily when practicing some gymnastics. They aren't pros or anything but it's a fun hobby. My youngest was excited to be able to do a cartwheel on the beam. It holds up really well (even I can walk on it). It's also super easy to fold up and stow away- my kids are able to do this themselves without my help which is nice! My kids are ages 9 and 11.
customer_reviews.author: Mia bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. Even when just walking on it the beam squishes onto its side. Not even able to any beginner tricks on it. Hops impossible. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Soft and squishy
customer_reviews.text: This balance beam is good for small children (under 40lbs) learning to walk on a beam. My 8 year old is using it while our gym is closed due to the pandemic and it squishes under her (50lb, 4’4”) so it’s difficult to use for anything than forward and backward rolls or walking and feels more like the octagons you use in the gym to teach the littles how to do back handsprings. It’s a decent place holder while we build her a wood beam.
customer_reviews.author: SCMama

customer_reviews.title: Gymnastics gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my granddaughter who has been taking gymnastics. Now she can practice safety the balance beam in her bedroom. Very reasonably priced for gym equipment. Came shipped in two pieces which one can just slide under the bed when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D Roach

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter has made her transition from power tumbling to gymnastics so I was looking for a beam for her to practice on at home. This beam is perfect for her to practice her balance without worrying that she will get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Jomaira

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this beam as a gift & it was a huge hit. The little girl I bought it for turned 5 & loves gymnastics. All the children at the party (some adults too!) were trying it out! This mat is sturdy, easy to store as it bends in half & safe for practicing at home. 100% would recommend & I will most likely be purchasing again. I work with young children & this item is perfect for working on balance and coordination.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great beam!
customer_reviews.text: Im so happy with this, I ordered another from a different vendor previously and I sent it back and got a credit to buy thus one! Folds up nicely and fits under my daughters bed when not in use. Her friends from cheer & tumbling LOVE practicing on it with her as well. Great product. A+++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Hall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for toddlers and pre-K kids
customer_reviews.text: I researched balance beams that would be suitable for 2-3 year olds and this was the best for the money! Hard foam to carry an adults weight, vinyl outer layer for easy cleaning, folds in half easily for simple storage. Light enough for the kids to move it. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids really love this balance beam
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids really love this balance beam. My 8 year old granddaughter is in gymnastics and uses it to practice some. Her and her little brother mostly just like playing on it. It is considerably softer than the gym's balance beam so it is a little difficult to practice some things and get the same effect. Still it is great for balance, and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lavattiata

customer_reviews.title: This is more like putting tape on the floor and telling your kid ...
customer_reviews.text: Not really a "balance beam". This is more like putting tape on the floor and telling your kid to stay on the line. It smashes flat as soon as my 8 year old tried to get on it and now I am having to build one anyway. Delivery was fast and convienient however so can't one star them because it isn't the company's fault. The mat itself just is not firm enough to work as a real balance beam.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: A good beam for young gymnasts.
customer_reviews.text: A great present for a young gymnast. I say young because my daughter is at a higher level, and in 2 days of her practicing it’s taken quite a beating. I’m worried at this point it won’t hold up very long. I will update later to see how well it’s held up
customer_reviews.author: DLopez42

customer_reviews.title: Poor Product.
customer_reviews.text: Was not what I was expecting and doesnt hold up well to being used.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Toddler perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my almost 3 year old. Instant hit!! It lies perfectly flat on the floor, super soft foam, and folds nicely for storage. Would recommend for any toddler!
customer_reviews.author: BurdHouseLiving

customer_reviews.title: Really not good for actual gymnastics.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how soft and foamy this was. It is not very easy to walk on or do tricks and isn't the best for ankles, either. I thought it would be firmer. It is fine for just walking and playing on, which the kids do, but if you want something to practice actual gymnastics, this isn't good for that.
customer_reviews.author: mandican

customer_reviews.title: Moves too much.... Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: It could potentially be dangerous. I watched my 6 year old daughter practice on this, and opted to purchase a more expensive one. Her feet were constantly slipping, but more importantly, in her attempt to stay on, her ankles were constantly contorted. Not worth it. Spend a bit more and buy something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Gue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for sensory kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my daughter who has a sensory processing disorder to work on balance and to get her much desired vestibular input. She loves it! Its pretty sturdy but soft enough to where I'm not worried if they fall on it. My 4 & 2 yr old love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: much more like a mat than a beam
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it, but I was hoping for something firmer to more closely simulate a beam surface. This has a lot of squish, much more like a mat than a beam.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D Hart

customer_reviews.title: Helps restore balance
customer_reviews.text: Great for helping with PT exercises for improving balance. Less expensive than foam used at therapy
customer_reviews.author: Roapp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves this! It came in heavy duty wrapping and was in great shape. She weighs 50lbs and there’s plenty of support for her. She’s teaching herself to do cartwheels on the beam. It was the perfect Christmas gift. This was the best price for a 9ft I could find.
customer_reviews.author: John & Erika

customer_reviews.title: Stable, safe and fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some other reviewers, I think this floor beam is VERY stable (we have it placed on carpet). My daughters like it, though I think they prefer the incline (cheese) mat. Folds up easily and seems high quality. Keeps them entertained during these loooong winter months.
customer_reviews.author: PA mom

customer_reviews.title: Not used as original goal, but kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this almost a year ago, and kids are using it almost every other week-end and no sign of getting weak. They do use this as a bridge over the "ocean" floor in the basement, so it definitely can be used for other purposes. Kids stopped gymnastics, so they are not as interested to practice on it than use it as props for their imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Huu Da

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was a bit firmer
customer_reviews.text: Bought for kids so they could practice there gymnastics at home. They have used it a lot and it has held up over the time. They use it indoors and outside. The only thing that they have said negatively about it is that they wish it was a bit firmer because it is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Beam. Squishier than I expected. 4 1/2 star rating.
customer_reviews.text: 4 1/2 star rating. This beam is so good! I love it so much! It's so great to fold and doesn't matter if I miss a foot on it. The sturdiness is good unless you lean more on one side than the other, than it will tip a little bit. Just a little bit though, not much. This is my first beam and Love it! It's a little hard to use on an uneven surface like on the grass and stuff, but it's great! It's a little hard for jumps. It's like 95% great for jumps and 5% LITTLE BIT un-sturdy. Overall I'd give a 4 1/2 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: emorris2008

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat for my 9 and 6yo to use. It's solid. They are beginner gymnasts - currently using mostly for cartwheels, walking, jumps. The fact that it folds up makes for easy use and storage. Prevent slippage on hardwood floors by attaching some strong tape rolls to the underside. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: LAgym

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!!
customer_reviews.text: We got his for my 5 year old for Christmas. She uses it all the time. Holding up well! Great value for the money! Light enough for her to transport from playroom to living room. Folds up for storage up against a wall or under a bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Harding

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my daughger never got to use it bc she broke her knee cap before it arrived but it is exactly as described. Sturdy- easily folds and held my weight as a grown woman weighing more than the average child! So even with my weight it seems to support and did not sag. Good product-
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Starting to crack, only had a few months.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic on this beam is starting to crack. This makes it difficult for my daughter to walk on the beam. Return window just closed on this Sept 13th so I can't even return or replace it.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca s.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this beam. I was nervous about its ability to hold up, since it's just made out of foam, but she's had it since December and it's still sturdy :-) she is 8 years old.
customer_reviews.author: J. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning to tumble on a beam
customer_reviews.text: Good length balance beam for my 10 year old who is learning to tumble on a beam. This is perfect for learning and made of good quality material; No slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy-peasy balance beam!
customer_reviews.text: This was meant to be for our seven-year-old, but the whole family is now enjoying taking balance challenges and doing tricks . It’s as easy to have put as it is to put away.
customer_reviews.author: Everest Maillard

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My age 6 granddaughters love this. They are in gymnastics and like practicing.
customer_reviews.author: Diana K

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves this. She practices her cartwheels on it and has so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: SJC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this portable balance beam. Perfect for at home use. Lightweight and easy to carry from her room to basement or even outside or to a fitness house to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open and close - Easy storage
customer_reviews.text: Love this beam - Folds up and easy to store - No cons - My 11 year old loves this beam and just enjoys gymnastics ever more now - Great item - Exactly what I expected by the sellers details - Would recommend and would definitely buy again from this seller - Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Yankeegirl831

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, folds well but sturdiness even for my 30lb daughter is less than expected. It doesnt tend to hold up as well as expected. That said she loves using and and does so quite often. Has started working on many of the moves at home she is learning at gymnastics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to bring around
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to bring around! It’s great for kids just starting to learn. Haven’t had any issues with it. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginner
customer_reviews.text: This is a good at home practice beam for beginners. My 6 year old is super happy with it and loves to practice on it. I was hoping it would be a little more firm, but overall it’s a good mat.
customer_reviews.author: JLLaceYLYL

customer_reviews.title: Very nice...
customer_reviews.text: Great little beam for my daughter to practice with. Folds in half and easily stores away.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea W.

customer_reviews.title: Too squishy- not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter and was extremely disappointed. The foam is so squishy so when she does a cartwheel on it, her foot squished down. It’s not sturdy or firm at all. If it wasn’t a pain, I return it because now I have to find a new beam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: she is having fun. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my six year old who is a level two recreational gymnast. And she loves it. It is soft, light-weight and I really think it's helping with her balance. Most importantly, she is having fun. Great product. Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: saracourtneyw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! 9yr old and 5yr old constantly use it. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition for my daughter to practice her tumbling skills
customer_reviews.author: 393foxmustang

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I thought this balance beam would be much more sturdy, it’s like walking on a bed it bends too much.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It has taken quite the beating since we received it. Folds up nicely, easy to clean, easy storage. Great for spaces that are a little tight. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK

customer_reviews.title: Not as firm for gymnasts working on their beam exercises
customer_reviews.text: Not as firm and durable as we thought it'd be. Our little 45-55 lb kids squish it to death while working on their beam exercises. For the price, it's not terrible, but definitely could be a bit harder material. Easy for my kids to fold up and store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My daughter weighs barely 50#s and it doesn't support her. I am very unhappy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony from NJ

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great product for younger newly starting gymnastics. Not to big and can fit in any room. My daughter enjoys practicing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cjenn0222

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: daughter loves this for practicing gymnastics at home! easy to store since it folds in half and extremely lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Kels

customer_reviews.title: but it isn't bad.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars only because after after a year of many hours spent on this, and kids jumping around on it. It is starting to lose a little cushion. but it isn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Island

customer_reviews.title: Nice “toy”
customer_reviews.text: Kinda soft which makes it hard for a beginner imo. Easy to store and fast folding
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased to help my daughter with balancing her handstands.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy for a balance beam, I think
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy for my small niece, but she loves it anyways!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: Way softer than a real balance beam but my daughter still practices on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for young gymnasts
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 2- and 6-year-old. It is more soft than firm so probably not great for older girls really trying to practice beam. It does fold up which is great for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: little pricey for what it actually is when you breakdown the materials....but it works and is practical
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 8 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 8 year old daughter. She's just beginning to get into gymnastics and this was perfect. If your child is more advanced this is kind of squishy so you may need a real beam for them. Super fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my granddaughter and she likes it. Easy for her to move herself
customer_reviews.author: nita

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this beam. The color is awesome and so is the material. My 1.5 yr old loves it. Folds in half for easier storage. Soft enough and low enough that falls are no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have lighter kids
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold a 90lb kid, very soft.. hoping for it to be stiffer
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this. She is able to practice at home between gymnastics lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled to get a beam
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my niece for Christmas and she was so happy.
customer_reviews.author: LaToya Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: beam was softer than it should be. the manufacture ...
customer_reviews.text: beam was softer than it should be. the manufacture should use a more firm foam so that it can actually be used for its intended purpose. fast shipping though
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill Slusher

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to fold and store. Not happy with how it’s already breaking down after such a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Smith

customer_reviews.title: So study, lightweight, easy and AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect beam for a kid learning or practicing beam routines. Holds up under adult weight of 130lbs and even close to 180. Kids aged 8 and 11 love it
customer_reviews.author: MaryH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is loving it! It's great for practicing turns and spins!
customer_reviews.author: bpribs

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old girl approved. Light and easy to move around
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love it. Just like the kid my youngest uses in her class.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this!! It definitely does the job. How ever it is big and even with folding can be hard to store if you don’t have the proper room.
customer_reviews.author: Koda

customer_reviews.title: Nice beam
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Holds up to being jumped on and flips being done on it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home practice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold and move around the house. Tucks away easily under a bed or in a closet. My 10 year old gymnast uses it everyday and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: KScof

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter couldn't love this beam more! sturdy and works great for practice!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Green

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 7 year old who is practicing for the big beams!
customer_reviews.author: gabbie

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller kids
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my girls, lightweight and easy to fold and move out of the way to store. Best for smaller girls as it is foam and will compress, but for their 40lb bodies works perfect. Much easier than a wooden beam for now.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality physical activity item for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is really good quality and my kids both 18mos old and 6 yr old are having fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: MML

customer_reviews.title: Good product. But all beans should be wood base
customer_reviews.text: Even if your child is a beginner, you should order wood base. The pure foam thing is dangerous for the ankles. My daughter weighs 50lbs and the boarders isn’t sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and perfect for my 3 year old to pratice at home
customer_reviews.author: Nathan cates

customer_reviews.title: Good size, light weight and I like how it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for my toddler to practice on at home. Good size, light weight and I like how it folds. Make it easier to store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent beam for price
customer_reviews.text: I like this beam but my issue is my daughter slipping off of it when trying to do routines. Besides the slipping, it works well and my daughter learned to practice her level 1 beam and dismount on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Is a little soft like the mats not as firm as a real beam
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well made and my daughter loves it. Is a little soft like the mats not as firm as a real beam.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice Beam
customer_reviews.text: This is a great practice beam and the girls can move it about by themselves. Endless time playing and practicing on this.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Klipp

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old aspiring gymnast. She loves gymnastics and is always practicing around the house. I had to use tape to make her a "balance beam" on the floor. This really makes her focus on balance and has helped her improve her beam skills. She is very small and is able to pick it up and store it away when she's done with it. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER

customer_reviews.title: Good beginners beam &great space saver
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Very, very light weight. My 3 year old daughter folds it up and puts it away herself. I don’t like the fact it slides too easily/ no grip on the floor/ mats.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beginner balance beam!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this balance beam! she can take it into any room, or even outside. Perfect for praticing cartwheels and walkovers on.
customer_reviews.author: PrairieChick

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 5.5 year old can fold this up and take it across the street. I can fold it up and put it in the closet! Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: wadegirlsj

customer_reviews.title: I like the product for the most part and my girls ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product for the most part and my girls aren't too picky. My girls are 6 and 8 and it's a little too soft so when they are on it their weight kinda mushs it in ( hopefully that makes sense) if they were smaller and lighter it would be perfect. my 6 yr old is 45 lbs and my 8 yr old is 65 lbs and it could definitely be more solid. It serves its purpose and my girls still love using it.
customer_reviews.author: Elia

customer_reviews.title: nice to practice with for her
customer_reviews.text: my 8yr old is on this most days and it's holding up well. nice to practice with for her...
customer_reviews.author: wtpa

customer_reviews.title: Great for in home training
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for home training!! We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Pullen

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner tool
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this. It’s a great bigger tool for my daughter who’s been doing gymnastics for 2 years. It folds up to store under a bed and is light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: It's been great for my 11 year old
customer_reviews.text: It's been great for my 11 year old... Very soft so easy to try different tricks without getting hurt. Fits well over her floor mat.
customer_reviews.author: jzgurich

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: To soft. My daughter weighs 40lbs and compared to the Gym, it's half as firm.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Brito

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: What a great way for our little gymnast to practice at home! It stores so easily and is light enough for a child to get out and simple to set up. Great colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Faber

customer_reviews.title: The other Granddaughters love working out on it as well
customer_reviews.text: This mat was a birthday gift for my 6 year old Granddaughter - she loves it! The other Granddaughters love working out on it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalin Kordon

product_meta.title: We Sell Mats 9 ft Folding Foam Balance Beam Bar, Portable Gymnastics Equipment for Gymnast, Children or Cheerleaders
feature_bullets: FLOOR BALANCE BEAM FOR STABILITY: Home gymnastics foam balance beam is 9' long, 2. 5" high with a 4" surface and widens to 6" base for extra stability when practicing gymnastics and cheerleading moves.
EASY TO CARRY AND STORE: Smart foldable design makes it portable and compact for storage making it convenient for on-the-go-fitness, when traveling to the gym, a competition or exercising outdoors.

SKILL DEVELOPMENT FOR KIDS & YOUNG GYMNASTS: Cushioned pads provide safety and reassurance for your young gymnast, making it a perfect piece of equipment for children and toddlers developing skills at home.

FOAM CORE FOR PRACTICING WITH CONFIDENCE: Medium-density, crosslink foam core builds confidence for beam skills like walkovers, donkey kicks, handstands, jumps and leaps when training for practice or competitions.

EASY INSTALLATION AND CLEAN-UP: Assembles in seconds over any hardwood floor or flat indoor surface for extra padding needed when exercising. Vinyl surface resists tearing and is easy to wipe clean with a simple soap and water solution.
